divs: Sighting Detailsoutside walking a co worker to her car. a person in the parking lot was looking up and pointed out an object very high in the sky. the Round object hovered very high not moving for about 8-10 minutes. i got strangely excited and ran inside to the roof. brought a co worker to see and it was still there. so i ran back downstairs to get a camera. After running back up to the roof it was gone (or so i thought). i walked back downstairs to the other witnesses. They were still looking up and said it moved very fast gong east and suddenly stopped again. They pointed it out to me again and i spotted it farther east but it wasn't moving. had the vallets keep an eye out on it but it was gone after talking to them. i have always been a skeptic but i cant figure out what the hell that was. felt a need to document it and found this site. good luck.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around May 4th 2010
